author: fabiocos
body: The PR cms-sw/cmssw#27488 has renamed the Phase 2 scenarios 2023DXX into 2026DXX . This PR updates the bot comparison matrix so as to account for these new names and allow correct comparisons in 11_0_X branch after July 17.
title: Add test wf after renaming 2023DXX into 2026DXX
